belongs_to_collection.name: Raw Collection (Evil Angel & Jules Jordan Video)

overview: In his "Raw" series, director Manuel Ferrara makes it personal. The big-dicked ladies' man documents his intimate, private encounters with the smut industry's most beautiful and lustful women, exposing their sex lives minus all the show-biz trappings of mainstream porn. The two-disc "Raw 8" showcases four gorgeous, horny performers in real, unscripted action with POV footage and one-on-one conversation to put Manuel's ferocious, hard-core sexuality in context.
title: Raw 8
